thread.title: Salman Khan gets a box of love letters during Prem Ratan Dhan Payo promotions in Ahmedabad
thread.title_full: Salman Khan gets a box of love letters during Prem Ratan Dhan Payo promotions in Ahmedabad

author: Rishabh Chakravorty
title: Salman Khan gets a box of love letters during Prem Ratan Dhan Payo promotions in Ahmedabad
text:
Salman Khan gets a box of love letters during Prem Ratan Dhan Payo promotions in Ahmedabad By Rishabh Chakravorty on October 25, 2015 at 2:57 PM Comments 
Salman Khan received a box of love letters when he visited Ahmedabad to promote his upcoming film Prem Ratan Dhan Payo. There were about 10,000 love letters from his fans in a big box for the Bajrangi Bhaijaan actor. Prem visited the city during Navratri to join his fans in the festivities. 
As he makes a comeback to his character as Prem in former Sooraj Barjatya films, he received a lot of love before he left the city. There were letters from fans from across the city. The gesture was a planned effort by Salman Khan fans in Ahmedabad to show their love for their favourite actor and it was a grand gesture. [Also Read: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo music review - Salman Khan, Sonam Kapoor movie has songs from the 90s ] 
Salman was surprised by the sheer number of letters and the size of the box it came in. He thanked his fans for showing love and for such a sweet gesture. Salman Khan’s residence in Mumbai is also a very busy route for the post office as the letters of love and accolades keep on coming. We will watch Salman Khan as Prem once again pretty soon with the film slated to release on November 12th, 2015. [Also Read: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo - One place for all the songs ] 
Salman Khan is come back on the silver screen as Prem. He also has a huge cast of actors with him like Anupam Kher , Sonam Kapoor, Neil Nitin Mukesh among several others. The film aims to entertain the family audience and it is a combined release with Rajshri Productions and Fox Star Studios banking heavily on it becoming this Diwali’s mega blockbuster.
